籤詩版本二:
Kutonhora kunoshandura mvura kuita aizi Seiko uchikara mukurumbira?
Handina chimwe chandinogona kuita kunze kwekugara ndakanyarara uye kumirira kuti mashizha aite zvakanaka.
詩意:
Mune iyi hexagram, mvura inoshanduka kuita ice.
Usakumbira chero chinhu pasina.
解曰: Mvura inogwamba kuita aizi. Aizi inonyungudika mumvura. Kana kuri kurangana. Ndizvo zvazviri.
